description: This table contains information about a transplant episode's phase, status, and reason.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the episode of care record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Each line represents a change in status for this transplant episode.

columns.name: TX_STAGE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The phase of the transplant episode, e.g. Pre-Evaluation, Evaluation, Transplanted.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Referral


Evaluation


Waitlist


Admitted for Transplant


Transplanted

columns.name: TX_STAT_DT
columns.description: Effective date associated with the patient's transplant phase, status, and reason.

columns.name: TX_STATUS_OUT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Status associated with the patient's transplant phase and reason.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Active


Internal Hold


Declined


Approved


Removed


Denied Follow-up


Denied Not Followed


Inactive


Deferred


Deferred Follow-up


Deferred Not Followed


Ineligible


Ready for Committee


Ready for Listing


Approved for Listing


Approved for Live Donor Only


Active Follow-up


Reporting Follow-up Only


Not Followed

columns.name: TX_STAT_UPD_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who updated the transplant phase, status, or reason.

columns.name: TX_STAT_UPD_INST
columns.description: The instant the transplant phase, status, or reason was updated.

columns.name: TX_STATUS_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
Reason for the patient's transplant phase and status.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Patient Died


Unable to Contact Patient


Financial/Insurance Complications


Patient Choice


Not a Candidate


Graft Lost


Other


Candidate Listed in Error


Program Inactive for 2+ Years


Transplanted in Another Country


Candidate Workup Incomplete


Substance Abuse


Medical Non-Compliance


Refused Transplant


Temporarily too Sick


Temporarily too Well


Transplant Pending


Weight Issues


Candidate for Living Donor Transplant Only


Physician/Surgeon Unavailable


Transferred to Another Center


Patient Died During Transplant Procedure


Candidate Condition Improved, Transplant Not Needed


Candidate Condition Deteriorated, too Sick for Transplant


Transplanted at Another Center


Candidate Listed for Unacceptable Antigens Only


Patient Lost to Follow-up


Referred too Early


Patient Cancellation


Patient No Show


Does Not Meet Criteria


Pending Additional Tests


Pending Insurance Approval


Ready for Scheduling


Scheduled for Evaluation


Ready for Committee


Ready for Listing


Followed Up at Another Location

columns.name: TXP_PHASE_ENC_CSN
columns.description: Contact Serial Number (CSN) for the encounter where the transplant phase, status, or reason was changed. This is used in the transplant history audit trail. It is also used to provide a link to the encounter in which the phase was changed.
